PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_DuctFittingTypeCommon
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Duct fitting type common attributes.

PropertyDef.Name: SubType
PropertyDef.Definition: Subtype of fitting (I.e., 5-gore, pleated, stamped, etc.)

PropertyDef.Name: MaterialThickness
PropertyDef.Definition: The thickness of the duct fitting material.

PropertyDef.Name: PressureClass
PropertyDef.Definition: Pressure classification as defined by the authority having jurisdiction (e.g., SMACNA, etc.).

PropertyDef.Name: PressureRange
PropertyDef.Definition: Allowable maximum and minimum working pressure (relative to ambient pressure).

PropertyDef.Name: NominalDiameterOrWidth
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal diameter or width of the duct fitting. If the list contains only one value, then this nominal diameter or width applies to all ports. For more than value in the list, the nominal diameter or width value applies to the port that corresponds to the list index.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalHeight
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal height of the duct fitting. Refer to NominalDiameterOrWidth for comments about interpretation of multiple items in the list.

PropertyDef.Name: EndStyleTreatment
PropertyDef.Definition: The end-style treatment of the duct fitting manufactured. If the list contains only one value, then this end-style applies to all ports. For more than one value in the list, the end-style value applies to the port that corresponds to the list index.The following suggested items should be utilized whenever possible for correlation with port enumerations: ANGLE: Angle. BEADEDSLEEVE: Beaded Sleeve. BRAZED: Brazed. COMPRESSION: Compression. CRIMP: Crimp. DRAWBAND: Drawband. DRIVESLIP: Drive slip. FLANGED: Flanged. OUTSIDESLEEVE: Outside Sleeve. SLIPON: Slipon. SOLDERED: Soldered. SSLIP: S-Slip. STANDINGSEAM: Standing seam. SWEDGE: Swedge. WELDED: Welded. NONE: No end-style treatment has been applied. NOTDEFINED: Undefined end-style type.
